Text: Echi ku me̩ chi le̩, e̩wñ o̩kpakpa me̩ ka ochochi?
O̩da, me̩ nʼuko̩lo̩ uji ache ef e̩do̩-me̩;
Ame̩ne̩bibi mud e̩wñ ejaduña kwef uwile̩,
O O̩jo̩, fʼenyi-ma guche̩ nyʼuma alu;
Je̩ ñw ma muya rinyo̩ dab omiofo kʼi acha rinyo̩;
Ama ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼigbi ki awʼito̩ rinyo̩,
O̩gba tak ucha-me̩ ama ka kʼikeke jʼofe-wñ,
E̩no̩kpakpa le̩ ayo̩ e̩gba kʼeju-wñ do ache̩ ku ma ana;
Oñ amone̩ akakini, Ochochi uro̩me̩ ado̩mo̩ ñw e̩no̩kpakpa:
